interstitial.heading: You're leaving the Hub
interstitial.message: You are being taken to {{url}}. You are allowed to visit this website.
interstitial.detail: Internet access is restricted in prisons so links to other websites are blocked.
interstitial.doNotShowMessage: Don't show me this message again

headings.alternative: Tell us what you think about this page

like.4: It was easy for me to understand

dislike.4: It was hard for me to understand

contact.preamble: If you want to contact someone about anything else:
contact.1: Send an app or a digital request
contact.2: Speak to your Digital PID, an officer or keyworker
contact.4: Read and watch more about mental health
contact.5: Contact NPR with a shout out or song request

solitaire.instructions1: You've told us that the solitaire game is not working as you can't drag a card to where you want it.
solitaire.instructions2: Here's how to make a move in this version of the game:
solitaire.instructions3: To move a card select the card you want to move. The edges will turn yellow. Next select the space where you want it to go.
solitaire.instructions4: The game can be a little slow to register a move so give it time for the move to happen.
solitaire.instructions5: Select the pile in the top left of the game to reveal new cards.
